name: Parry King
description:
Deflect Death's sweeping scythe. Parry King is a combat-focused action game built around deflecting or "parrying" enemy attacks, and quickly ramps up in difficulty. 

Basic Controls (You do not have to read this in order to begin playing)

  • A and D to move left and right
  • Up and Down to parry (parrying in the direction of the swing is more effective with large weapons)
  • S to execute fallen enemies, and later to also duck under attacks
  • Right to attack
  • W to jump over low attacks
  • Esc to close the game
  • F4 to delete save and start over
